title: How to Get to the Freedom Tunnel

steps.title: Take the 1 train to 125th street.
steps.content: Take the 1 train to 125th street. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Walk underneath the bridge until you come to an overpass.
steps.content: Walk underneath the bridge until you come to an overpass. The tracks are now above you. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Walk up the hill and slip through the gap between the fence and the overpass.
steps.content: Walk up the hill and slip through the gap between the fence and the overpass. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Follow the tracks until you reach the tunnel.
steps.content: Follow the tracks until you reach the tunnel. [4] X Research source

steps.title: At the end of your journey, you'll exit the tunnel and find yourself fenced into a sort of pen.
steps.content: At the end of your journey, you'll exit the tunnel and find yourself fenced into a sort of pen. Simply hop this fence using one of the overpass pillars, and walk to Riverside Park.
